channel.title: Guang Zhou on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Guang Zhou on EICP-LAB

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Pinghan Liang from the School of Government at Sun Yat-sen University was invited to deliver a lecture on the topic:Why is there so much surveillance in China? An Explanation from a Fiscal Perspective.

item.title: The International Workshop on Regional Air Quality Management in Rapidly Developing Economic Regions
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu was invited to attend the 7th International Workshop on Regional Air Quality Management in Rapidly Developing Economic Regions (7RAQM), served as the host of a parallel session, and presented her work titled “Evidence from Environmental Regulation and Industrial Firm Productivity in China”.
